metadata.title: CVE-2016-20013 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - negligible
metadata.description: sha256crypt and sha512crypt through 0.6 allow attackers to cause a denialof service (CPU consumption) because the algorithm's runtime isproportional to the square of the length of the password.

criterions.comment: syslinux package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
syslinux-legacy package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
glibc package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
sssd package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
zabbix package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
